scripts.build-preact: yarn add-preact && yarn build && yarn remove-preact
scripts.analyze-preact: yarn add-preact && yarn analyze && yarn remove-preact
scripts.add-preact: patch -p1 -u package.json -i preact.patch && mv next.config.js next.config.js.bak && mv next.config.js.preact next.config.js && yarn
scripts.remove-preact: mv next.config.js next.config.js.preact && mv next.config.js.bak next.config.js && patch -R -p1 -u package.json -i preact.patch && yarn
scripts.gql-codegen: dotenv -e .env.contentful-codegen -- cross-var fix-contentful-schema --output graphql.schema.json --token %CONTENTFUL_CONTENT_TOKEN% --management %CONTENTFUL_MANAGEMENT_TOKEN% --space %CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID% && graphql-codegen --config codegen.yml
